channel.title: CSI on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in CSI on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: snapscheduler
item.description:
Description

An operator to take scheduled snapshots of Kubernetes persistent volumes

  • https://github.com/backube/snapscheduler

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
snapscheduler default âŒ â€” 10 2 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ðŸ¤– snapscheduler

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ðŸ”‘ Permissions (10)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
Role snapscheduler-leader-election coordination.k8s.io/leases create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical ControlPlaneDisruption CriticalNamespace DenialOfService Tampering
Role snapscheduler-leader-election core/configmaps create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High ConfigMapAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering

item.description:
